name: mandiant-threat-intel
label: Mandiant Threat Intelligence
description: Mandiant Threat Intelligence provides automated access to indicators of compromise (IOCs) â€” IP addresses, domain names, URLs threat actors are using, via the indicators, allows access to full length finished intelligence in the reports, allows for notificaiton of threats to brand and keyword monitoring via the alerts, and finally allows searching for intelligence on the adversary with the search. This connector facilitates automated operations such as indicators, reports, alerts, and search collections.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: The service-based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Public Key
fields.name: public_key
fields.description: Unique Public Key of the Mandiant Threat Intel that is used to create an authentication token required to access the Mandiant Threat Intel API.

fields.title: Private Key
fields.name: private_key
fields.description: Unique Private Key of the Mandiant Threat Intel that is used to create an authentication token required to access the Mandiant Threat Intel API.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.

operations.description: Retrieves indicators from Mandiant Threat Intel based on the input parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Get Indicators

parameters.title: Created At
parameters.name: added_after
parameters.description: Created datetime from when you want to retrieve indicators from Mandiant Threat Intel.

parameters.title: Size
parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Number of results that you want this operation to return, per page, in the response. The maximum number of results per page is set items to 50.

parameters.title: STIX UUID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: STIX ID of the alert object based on which you want to retrieve indicators from Mandiant Threat Intel.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filters on whether the indicator is in an active state or has been revoked.

operations.description: Retrieves reports from Mandiant Threat Intel based on the input parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Get Reports

parameters.title: Created At
parameters.name: added_after
parameters.description: Created datetime from when you want to retrieve indicators from Mandiant Threat Intel.

parameters.title: Size
parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Number of results that you want this operation to return, per page, in the response. The maximum number of results per page is set items to 50.

parameters.title: Report ID
parameters.name: report_id
parameters.description: STIX ID of the alert object based on which you want to retrieve indicators from Mandiant Threat Intel.

parameters.title: Document ID
parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: Filters this operation to a single report using the reportID

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filters on whether the reports is in an active state or has been revoked.

parameters.title: Subscription
parameters.name: subscription
parameters.description: Filters on a specific subscription of reports either ThreatScape or role based intel.

parameters.title: Report Type
parameters.name: report_type
parameters.description: Filter on a reportType, for multiple report types use.

parameters.title: Actor Name
parameters.name: actor_name
parameters.description: Filters the report results down to a specific actor, to return all matching reports for that actor.

parameters.title: Malware Name
parameters.name: malware_name
parameters.description: Filters the report results down to a specific malware family, to return all matching reports for that malware family.

operations.description: Retrieves alerts from Mandiant Threat Intel based on the input parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Get Alerts

parameters.title: Created At
parameters.name: added_after
parameters.description: Created datetime from when you want to retrieve alerts from Mandiant Threat Intel.

parameters.title: Size
parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Number of results that you want this operation to return, per page, in the response. The maximum number of results per page is set items to 50.

parameters.title: ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: STIX ID of the alert object based on which you want to retrieve alerts from Mandiant Threat Intel.

parameters.title: Alert Type
parameters.name: alert_type
parameters.description: Filters on a specific alerts sources.

parameters.title: Alert Status
parameters.name: alert_status
parameters.description: Filters on a specific alerts status.

parameters.title: Alert Categories
parameters.name: alert_categories
parameters.description: Filters on a specific category of alerts.

parameters.title: Alert Severity
parameters.name: alert_severity
parameters.description: Filters down to the alert severity the user wants to receive.

operations.description: Retrieves collections from Mandiant Threat Intel based on the input parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Search Collections

parameters.title: Queries
parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Queries is the list of Query Objects. Each query object includes the type and query properties.

parameters.title: Include Connected Objects
parameters.name: include_connected_objects
parameters.description: Indicates whether objects connected to matching objects, through a reference or relationship, will be included in the search response.

parameters.title: Connected Objects
parameters.name: connected_objects
parameters.description: Lists all connections, which all contain following fields like connection_type, connected_type, object_type, property, or relationship_type

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sort By specifies the property of the object on which results are to be sorted. Sort By is applicable only when the include_connected_object flag is set to false.
parameters.tooltip: Sort By specifies the property of the object on which results are to be sorted. Sort By is applicable only when the include_connected_object flag is set to false.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: This field specifies the direction of sort. Sort order can be set to "asc" (ascending) or "desc" (descending). If the sort order is not specified, it will default to ascending. Note that the sort_order is only applicable when the include_connected_object flag is set to false.
parameters.tooltip: This field specifies the direction of sort. Sort order can be set to "asc" (ascending) or "desc" (descending). If the sort order is not specified, it will default to ascending. Note that the sort_order is only applicable when the include_connected_object flag is set to false.
